description: Your app has a nice icon and a good layout to be visually apealing, but it doesn't display correctly, cutting the left and right out of screen on some screen sizes, please add some auto-scaling settings to your application so it's usable.

What I love about these curated GNOME apps is how they each do one job and one job perfectly. I have been needing a tuner that could pick up my bass guitar without requiring me to install an entire DAW or log in to an online service just to tune. This app is exactly what I needed!

I don't know if developers ever see these reviews, but if you do see this, I really appreciate the work you put in just to keep other players happy. Thank you!
I was looking for Lingot flatpak but found this...thanks!
and finds my focusrite scarlett sound card

Two fatal problems: (1) the tuning needle in the visual display is completely non-responsive and (2) the thing freezes and crashes if I try to change the input from automatic to manual, every single time. I'm running a fully updated Fedora 39.
